import { StyledExperienceTimeline } from "../styles/Experience.styled"; import { StyledTechSection, StyledTechnology } from "../styles/About.styled"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; export default function ExperienceTimeline() { const [t] = useTranslation("global"); i18next.t('experiences', { returnObjects: true }); console.log(experiences); return (

{t("experiences.0.position")} • {t("experiences.0.company")}

{t("experiences.0.startDay")} - {t("experiences.0.endDay")} • {t("experiences.0.location")} • {t("experiences.0.workType")} Javascript HTML CSS React Vite Bootstrap UI/UX

{t("experiences.0.description")}

Learn More

{/*
  • Point 1 very long very long
  • Point 2
*/}

{t("experiences.1.position")} • {t("experiences.1.company")}

{t("experiences.1.startDay")} - {t("experiences.1.endDay")} • {t("experiences.1.location")} • {t("experiences.1.workType")} Python XML XSLT Software Testing Documentation SDLC Zoho

{t("experiences.1.description")}

Learn More

{/*
  • Identified 10% of software defects and confirmed 15% of resolved issues using Zoho bug tracking
  • Delved into different testing types including functional, non-functional, regression, and performance testing
  • Used XML for configuration and Python (ElementTree) to convert Excel data into structured content with unique code numbers
  • Enhanced project's portability by standardizing file paths and file I/O
  • Improved the user interface using Python (Tkinter) to be more user-friendly
*/}
); }
